title: Caribbean
creator_contributor_role: Central Office of Information, Crown Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Caribbean Area - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Caribbean Area - Description and travel
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film festivals - Italy - Venice - Awards
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Caribbean Area - Social conditions
description: Made before the Federation of the islands of the West Indies, this film shows the people, customs, export products, social problems, and scenery of the British West Indies, British Guiana, and British Honduras. Interwoven with a musical background of calypso music ritual drumming, ancient folk songs and traditional dance rhythms. (Awards: 1st prize Venice Film Festival 1951)
